f Frasier syndrome.  Frasier syndrome has features similar to another condition called Denys-Drash syndrome, which is also caused by mutations in the WT1 gene. Because these two conditions share a genetic cause and have overlapping features, some researchers have suggested that they are part of a spectrum and not two distinct conditions.",GHR,Frasier syndrome
Is Frasier syndrome inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in
